deckInfo.name: Chinese -  My Little Apple
deckInfo.description: Covers Level 1 (characters & small words), Level 2 (phrases), and Level 3 (full lines) for the Chorus of My Little Apple.

vocabulary.name: ping2guo3
vocabulary.explanation: 蘋 (píng) - apple (used in compounds) + 果 (guǒ) - fruit = apple.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 怎 (zěn), 么 (me) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: zen3me
vocabulary.explanation: 怎 (zěn) - how/why + 么 (me) - (suffix for interrogatives) = how?, what?, why?

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 嫌多 (xiánduō) - consider too much
conceptGroups.description: Characters 嫌 (xián), 多 (duō) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: xian2
vocabulary.englishText: to dislike, to mind, to complain of

vocabulary.name: xian2duo1
vocabulary.englishText: to consider too much, to find excessive
vocabulary.explanation: 嫌 (xián) - to dislike/mind + 多 (duō) - many/much = to consider too much, to find excessive.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 小脸儿 (xiǎoliǎnr) - small face
conceptGroups.description: Characters 小 (xiǎo), 脸 (liǎn), 儿 (r) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: er2
vocabulary.explanation: (noun suffix, retroflex final).

vocabulary.name: xiao3lian3r
vocabulary.explanation: 小 (xiǎo) - small + 脸 (liǎn) - face + 儿 (r) - (noun suffix) = small face.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 温 (wēn), 暖 (nuǎn) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: wen1nuan3
vocabulary.explanation: 温 (wēn) - warm + 暖 (nuǎn) - warm = warm, to make warm.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 心 (xīn), 窝 (wō) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: xin1wo1
vocabulary.explanation: 心 (xīn) - heart + 窝 (wō) - nest/pit = pit of the stomach, heart.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 点亮 (diǎnliàng) - light up
conceptGroups.description: Characters 点 (diǎn), 亮 (liàng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: dian3
vocabulary.englishText: point, dot, to light, to kindle

vocabulary.name: dian3liang4
vocabulary.explanation: 点 (diǎn) - to light + 亮 (liàng) - bright/light = to light up, to illuminate.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 生 (shēng), 命 (mìng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: sheng1
vocabulary.englishText: to be born, to give birth, life, raw

vocabulary.name: sheng1ming4
vocabulary.explanation: 生 (shēng) - life + 命 (mìng) - life/fate = life.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 就像 (jiùxiàng) - just like
conceptGroups.description: Characters 就 (jiù), 像 (xiàng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: xiang4
vocabulary.englishText: to be like, to resemble, image

vocabulary.name: jiu4xiang4
vocabulary.explanation: 就 (jiù) - just/precisely + 像 (xiàng) - to be like = just like, as if.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 天 (tiān), 边 (biān) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: tian1bian1
vocabulary.explanation: 天 (tiān) - sky + 边 (biān) - side/edge = horizon, sky's edge.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 云 (yún), 朵 (duǒ) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: yun2duo3
vocabulary.explanation: 云 (yún) - cloud + 朵 (duǒ) - (measure word for clouds/flowers) = cloud.

conceptGroups.description: Character 春 (chūn) and the combined word with 天 (tiān).

vocabulary.name: chun1tian1
vocabulary.explanation: 春 (chūn) - spring + 天 (tiān) - sky/day = spring (season).

conceptGroups.description: Characters 来 (lái), 到 (dào) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: dao4
vocabulary.englishText: to arrive, to reach, to (a place)

vocabulary.name: lai2dao4
vocabulary.explanation: 来 (lái) - to come + 到 (dào) - to arrive/reach = to arrive, to come to.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 山 (shān), 坡 (pō) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: shan1po1
vocabulary.explanation: 山 (shān) - mountain/hill + 坡 (pō) - slope = hillside, mountain slope.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 种下 (zhǒngxià) - to plant
conceptGroups.description: Characters 种 (zhǒng), 下 (xià) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: zhong4
vocabulary.englishText: to plant, to grow, to cultivate

vocabulary.name: xia4
vocabulary.englishText: down, downwards, below, to go down

vocabulary.name: zhong4xia4
vocabulary.explanation: 种 (zhòng) - to plant + 下 (xià) - down/below (indicates completion/result) = to plant, to sow.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 希 (xī), 望 (wàng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: wang4
vocabulary.englishText: to hope, to expect, to look towards, to gaze into the distance

vocabulary.name: xi1wang4
vocabulary.explanation: 希 (xī) - to hope/wish + 望 (wàng) - to hope/expect = hope, to wish, to hope.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 收 (shōu), 获 (huò) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: shou1
vocabulary.englishText: to receive, to accept, to collect

vocabulary.name: huo4
vocabulary.englishText: to obtain, to catch, to reap, to harvest

vocabulary.name: shou1huo4
vocabulary.englishText: to harvest, to reap, gains, results
vocabulary.explanation: 收 (shōu) - to collect/receive + 获 (huò) - to obtain/reap = to harvest, to reap, gains, results.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Other Core Vocabulary from Chorus
conceptGroups.description: Introducing other essential single characters from the chorus.

vocabulary.name: ya5
vocabulary.explanation: (interjectory particle expressing surprise or emphasis).

vocabulary.name: le5
vocabulary.englishText: (modal particle intensifying preceding clause), (completed action marker)
vocabulary.explanation: (modal particle intensifying preceding clause), (completed action marker).

vocabulary.name: kai1
vocabulary.englishText: to open, to start, to turn on, to boil

vocabulary.name: hui4
vocabulary.englishText: can, to be able to, will, to meet

conceptGroups.description: Reviewing key phrases from the chorus.

vocabulary.name: xiao3_ya_xiao3_ping2guo3r
vocabulary.explanation: '小 (xiǎo)' - small; '呀 (ya)' - (interjectory particle); '苹果儿 (píngguǒr)' - apple.

vocabulary.name: zen3me_ai4_ni3
vocabulary.explanation: '怎么 (zěnme)' - how; '爱 (ài)' - to love; '你 (nǐ)' - you.

vocabulary.name: dou1_bu4_xian2duo1
vocabulary.englishText: (I can) never love you too much / (I) don't find it excessive at all
vocabulary.explanation: '都 (dōu)' - all/entirely; '不 (bù)' - not; '嫌多 (xiánduō)' - to find excessive.

vocabulary.name: hong2_hong2_de_xiao3lian3r
vocabulary.explanation: Adjective reduplication '红红 (hóng hóng)' emphasizes red; '的 (de)' - (possessive/descriptive particle); '小脸儿 (xiǎoliǎnr)' - small face.

vocabulary.name: wen1nuan3_wo3_de_xin1wo1
vocabulary.explanation: '温暖 (wēnnuǎn)' - to warm; '我 (wǒ)' - my; '的 (de)' - (possessive particle); '心窝 (xīnwō)' - heart.

vocabulary.name: dian3liang4_wo3_sheng1ming4_de_huo3
vocabulary.englishText: lights the fire of my life
vocabulary.explanation: '点亮 (diǎnliàng)' - to light up; '我生命 (wǒ shēngmìng)' - my life; '的 (de)' - (possessive particle); '火 (huǒ)' - fire.

vocabulary.name: tian1bian1_zui4_mei3_de_yun2duo3
vocabulary.englishText: the most beautiful cloud in the sky
vocabulary.explanation: '天边 (tiānbiān)' - horizon/sky's edge; '最美 (zuì měi)' - most beautiful; '的 (de)' - (descriptive particle); '云朵 (yúnduǒ)' - cloud.

vocabulary.name: chun1tian1_you4_lai2dao4
vocabulary.explanation: '春天 (chūntiān)' - spring; '又 (yòu)' - again; '来到 (láidào)' - to arrive.

vocabulary.name: hua1_kai1man3_shan1po1
vocabulary.englishText: flowers bloom all over the hillside
vocabulary.explanation: '花 (huā)' - flower; '开 (kāi)' - to bloom; '满 (mǎn)' - all over; '山坡 (shānpō)' - hillside.

vocabulary.name: zhong4xia4_xi1wang4
vocabulary.explanation: '种下 (zhǒngxià)' - to plant; '希望 (xīwàng)' - hope.

vocabulary.name: jiu4_hui4_shou1huo4
vocabulary.englishText: will then harvest / will then reap rewards
vocabulary.explanation: '就 (jiù)' - then; '会 (huì)' - will; '收获 (shōuhuò)' - to harvest.
